name: @rauschma/iterator-helpers-polyfill
description: A polyfill for the ECMAScript proposal “Iterator Helpers”
author: Axel Rauschmayer

scripts.syncify: ( cat ts/iterator-helpers-async.ts | sed -e 's/async //g' -e 's/await //g' -e 's/AsyncIterator/Iterator/g' -e 's/Symbol.asyncIterator/Symbol.iterator/g' -e 's/"async"/"sync"/g' -e 's/Promise</Identity</g' -e 's/[/][/]SYNC: //g' -e 's/❌//g' > ts/iterator-helpers-sync.ts ) && ( cat ts/iterator-helpers-async_test.ts | sed -e 's/async //g' -e 's/await //g' -e 's/AsyncIterator/Iterator/g' > ts/iterator-helpers-sync_test.ts )
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run syncify && npm run clean && npm run build
